name: Spirits (itch) (jennyhsiao0713)
description:
(unfinished game....) 

You are the avatar, but you don't know who you are. 

You wonder and wonder and wonder.... 

What are you looking for...? 

I don't know...

Perhaps you need to collect pieces of yourself.... 

Maybe that will help.... 

Just Maybe.....

It takes time....

But you can try.....
